content.question:
Use the graph to answer the question.

Which of the following is true when an economy is operating at the intersection of the <math alttext="A D 2" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>AD</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math> and <math alttext="S R A S 2" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>SRAS</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math> curves?

choices.label: The economy is facing a recessionary gap.
The economy is facing an inflationary gap.
The natural rate of unemployment is less than the actual unemployment rate.
The natural rate of unemployment is greater than the actual unemployment rate.
The economy is in short-run and long-run equilibrium.

content.answer: The economy is in short-run and long-run equilibrium.

topic.text: 3.5: Equilibrium in the Aggregate Demand-Aggregate Supply (AD-AS) Model

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
